title: I need someone who mains yasuo in high Elo ( Preferably Plat )to train me at yasuo
body:
I need some training on yasuo, my best with has was on normals and i went 48/6 and have 114.6K on yasuo at the moment. Though i feel like i have gotten good with yasuo, i haven't fully understood or mastered him. I want some help on yasuo. I't has been about a month since i stopped playing yasuo as i wanted to try other champions, now i want to get back to yasuo and it seems harder than when i played him a month ago so i need some training to refresh what i have learnt and get some new skills.
 Here is my full build ( In order )  {{champion:157}} {{summoner:4}} {{summoner:14}}{{item:3087}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3078}} {{item:3072}} {{item:3074}} {{item:3142}}  Pls PM or add me if u are willing to train me

replies.body: If you're a Zed main, you've probably heard of Azoh. Well, he has a series on YouTube for Yasuo as well. I imagine he will upload more to it in the future. I'll leave a link [here](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLUSnJ3s67h774IRF0hxb4r6wZ37f6FtKA), in case you are interested.
